intro: Stenospermation steyermarkii, commonly known as the Steyermark's narrow-seed plant, is a member of the Malvaceae family. It is characterized by its narrow, elongated leaves and small, clustered flowers. The plant produces capsule fruits that contain numerous tiny seeds. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is often found in moist, shaded habitats. Due to its limited distribution and specific ecological requirements, it is considered a rare and specialized species.
